short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the availability of a domain name.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Domain Availability Checker extension is a tool that allows users to quickly check the availability of a domain name while browsing the internet. 

The results are shown in a user-friendly format that makes it easy to see if a domain is available or already taken. The extension also shows top domain registrar so you can easily check price and buy domain.

This extension is particularly useful for individuals or businesses who are in the process of selecting a domain name for their website. It allows them to quickly search for and secure an available domain name without having to navigate away from their current browsing session.
